notes.text: The reason CA was good this season is that when I got KoG there werent many backrow decks on the ladder so I didnt need to main Trunade making the deck more consistent. The fast wins against Archfiends, Sylvans and Water secured an easy KoG. Right now this deck has too many problems. Both Geargia and Masked HERO require a changed build because this one is consistent but not powerful enough to combat both Match-Ups. I tried different builds but they are either not powerful or not consistent enough to actually have a good winrate. While its not very good right now when I got KoG a week ago it was the best choice for the ladder.
